properties.entry: select start_id, subject, content from pipelines_info
select start_id, subject, content from pipelines_info where start_id = ? and subject = ?
insert into pipelines_info (start_id, subject, content) values (?, ?, ?) on conflict on constraint pk_pipelines_info_start_id_subject do update set content = excluded.content
delete from pipelines_info where start_id = ? and subject = ?
